summary:
This a new version of TouchLightENB.

I work on a new version for change the time of day looks more realist, the contrast and on gamma.
descriptionHtml:
This ENB change the weather effect in game. THe Northern sky don't have the same color than the Southern Sky. 

You need a light source during the night if you wanna see something.


Requiered mods:
-[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17802]Climates of Tamriel[/url]

-[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50065/]Natural lighting and Atmospherics[/url]

-[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30450]Realistic Lighting Overhaul[/url]
[youtube]R5GlSu4-ct0[/youtube]


Other mod used:

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49661]Skyrim 4K by Zerwas1[/url]﻿

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/86851]Cyb's Remix Skin.[/url]
﻿
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60220]Verdant - A Skyrim grass plugin[/url]
